titleStmt.title: Receipt for Money of Tax Collection
titleStmt.author: Unknown officials (epimeletai or apodektai)

msContents.summary: Receipt issued by an unknown official to the sitologoi of Philadelphia for successive payments of money collected from arrears in the land tax
